name: Astromancer (StudioGenGen)
description:
Take the role of a Space Wizard Initiate on arrival at Astromancy Academy. It's the first day, what could go wrong?!

 This game was made for the Metroidvania Month XV gamejam. It was heavily inspired by games like Destiny, Metroid Dread, and some-crazy-how Blasphemous. I hope you enjoy it!
